Title: The people warmly love the sons and brothers in the army
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: On the wall is a poster of the model opera "On the Docks" (海港) that premiered in the early 1960s and was made into a movie in 1973.The poster is inscribed with a dedication to army dependents on the right-hand side.
